fusaka_updates.highlight: Blob-devnet-0 testing partial cells; Lighthouse/Prism live, disconnects under investigation
Need Teku, Nimbus, Grandine, Lodestar onboarded; Lodestar hopeful this week
All ELs have partial cells/GetBlobV3 in trunk branches

glamsterdam_bal_devnet_3.highlight: EIP-8037 dynamic cost-per-byte blocked on testing framework complexity
DevNet-3: hardcode cost-per-byte at 100M gas; dynamic version on DevNet-4
Spencer targets tests by ACDE Thursday using ills PR
EIP-3155 tracer changes (state gas, state gas cost) approved

testing_infrastructure.highlight: testing_buildBlockV1 endpoint: new testing namespace separates from debug namespace
Enables arbitrary block building, simplifies benchmarking and stateful test generation
Tests now available; PR will merge this week after review

epbs_devnet_0.highlight: Lodestar/Lighthouse interop working; Teku ready end-week; Prism next week
DevNet-0 launch scheduled March 4th regardless of client count

gas_repricing_benchmarking.highlight: Repricing tests: full benchmark loop exceeds 1 day for single data point
Test definition issues found; EIP-8038 numbers delayed past month-end
Amsterdam fork tests require testing_buildBlockV1 with fork parameter support

state_bloat_devnet.highlight: BloatNet back online; reached milestone contracts larger than mainnet max
Network instability at 100M gas + 3x state; clients breaking already
Proposal: validate equal key distribution at 300M gas before further bloat

action_items.action: Publish EIP-8037 ills PR with hardcoded cost-per-byte for DevNet-3
Update DevNet-3 spec sheet referencing hardcoded 8037 ills PR
Merge testing_buildBlockV1 execution-apis PR #747 with tests

decisions.decision: EIP-8037 DevNet-3: hardcode cost-per-byte using 100M gas formula; full dynamic version on DevNet-4
testing_buildBlockV1 endpoint required for clients starting DevNet-4
EPBS DevNet-0 launches March 4th with minimum 3 clients ready
BloatNet focus: reliable automated bloating over speed; 2 months to 10x acceptable

targets.target: February 27th (ACDE) - EIP-8037 tests release for DevNet-3
